projects.title: MyConcerts
projects.bodyText:
- Concert Attendance Tracker Website made in React
 -  Users can log in and track favorite artists, see upcoming concerts for saved artists, and view data charts of information from all prevously attended concerts.
 - *Note: App is no longer live due to expired API keys.*

links.text: App is no longer live due to expired API keys

projects.title: ImgSaverCSV
projects.bodyText: - Python script that will pull URL links in a .csv file and download them into an assigned directory; also pulls name information from the same row as the link to name the file

projects.title: Team Generator
projects.bodyText: - This is a program to generate Team Member Profile ID cards to display on a page

projects.title: My Weather Dashboard
projects.bodyText: - Application to find weather in major cities. Includes 5 day forecast, icon display, loads of data called from OpenWeather API, and local storage for cities searched to recall them later.
